item.description:
Prayers for Peace

The first Wednesday of every month from 7 - 8 p.m.

On the first Wednesday of every month, the members of all 15 Centers of Light pray for peace, creating a surge of positive energy for people all over the world. Open to all faiths, it is a chance for hearts and minds to make a real difference in the world. People pray for healing, spiritual awakening, love, solutions to hunger crises, war â€“ anything that the world needs in order to become a place of peace. Join us!

Center of Light Boston
200 Amory Street
Jamaica Plain, MA 02130

www.CentersOfLight.org
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Prayers for Peace
